entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. Your call is very important to us. Please hold while we connect you with the next available agent.
Hello, thank you for calling VeloFit. My name is Alex, how can I help you today?
Hi Alex, I'm calling about an exercise bike I recently purchased. I received it yesterday, and unfortunately, it seems to be damaged.
Oh no, I'm so sorry to hear that. Could you tell me a little more about the damage?
Well, when I was assembling it, I noticed a pretty significant crack in the frame. And after I put the rest of it together, the front wheel is incredibly wobbly. It’s unsafe to use.

I understand. That definitely sounds like it was affected by shipping damage. I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience this has caused you. We want you to be completely satisfied with your VeloFit purchase.
I appreciate that. I was really looking forward to using it.
Absolutely. To resolve this immediately, I'm going to offer you a full refund for the bike. Would that be acceptable to you?
Perfect. In addition to the refund, we'll also arrange for the bike to be picked up at no cost to you. I will email you a free label to attach to the box.
Oh, that's fantastic! So I don't have to worry about the return shipping costs?

Not at all. We'll take care of everything. I've already processed the refund, and you should see it reflected in your account within 5-7 business days. And the email with the free label and instructions for scheduling the pickup should arrive within the hour. Please note that if you notice a cracked frame or a wobbly wheel, or any type of shipping damage, you should let us know right away, just as you did. We're here to help.
Wow, that's amazing customer service! Thank you so much, Alex.
You're very welcome! Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that's all. Thank you again for your help!
You're very welcome. Thank you for choosing VeloFit. Have a great day!
